Это великолепная игра!
В этой игре весело летать среди порталов и ещё в этой игре очень много головоломок, прям даже заставляет немножко подумать, как пройти эту комнату. Эта игра тем более в наше время смотреться в принципе неплохо и я рекомендую сначала пройти первую часть, потому что вторая часть намного лучше первой и она длиннее. Единственный минус игры, что она проходится очень быстро, где-то за 2-4 ч, а если пройти на СПИДРАНЕ, то вообще за 5 минут. Эх. а Valve делали великолепные игры в это время, жалко что они скатились.
Я всем рекомендую пройти, вы не пожалеете!
Оценка: 8/10

This is the first first-person puzzle game I can recall that I can recall, and boy is it great. It's got a wicked sense of humor, and serves as a great metaphor for empty, meaningless work. A lot of good games can pluck that cord pretty well, now that i think of it. 

if you're on Steam, you probably already own it, but if you haven't played it yet, you owe that to yourself.

This game is short and charming.
The mechanic of using player controlled portals to traverse around a room and complete puzzles is interesting and fun.
The game has charm and it's definitely worth your time.

**Edit 10 (1530 hours 8/1/22): Right after my last update of my review I started up the game again, because I had just closed the game I got really confused because I forgot what I was doing, i vaguely remember something about getting the cube so I assumed that I had to bring the cube into the next chamber. This lead to a 150 hour experience of trying to get the cube into the ending hallway. Over the time that I wasn't playing it was constantly permeating my thoughts, wondering what to do next, it finally came to me, I needed to leave the cube on the button and walk to the elevator, this was scary for me because I have trouble exploring on my own. This still took around 10 hours walking into the walls constantly, but eventually, I made it into the elevator. Once I made it into the next chamber I fell into the pit with the cube, it took a couple hours of thinking about how I managed to escape the other pit, then I remembered that I have a portal gun, which again aided my escape from the pit. The next cube wasn't that bad, only taking me 20 hours to figure out how to do this, the solution of portaling over to the platform on the other side was incredible, the challenge of moving the cubes onto the button was tough because there was 2 cubes and 2 buttons but i got through it eventually. The difficult glass section right after this chamber was really tough, I'm not entirely sure how I did it but around 10 hours after I got there I accidentally did something that caused me to fall from the top of the top room. I then walked to the elevator taking me a couple hours. I'm currently in chamber 6 stuck, I have died to the energy ball around ~12,000 times within the last 245 hours, I think this is nearing the end of the game.

**Edit 9 (1,082 hours 10/28/21): finally, continuing my playthrough of portal, i decided that I did want to go into 04, that internal debate lasted for around 35 hours, eventually when i started it took me 20 hours to find the cube, when i did find it, nothing got better, i got stuck in the pit for around 25 hours because i wasnt able to place portals, the issue was that i was holding the cube, so it didnt let me shoot. when i dropped the cube i was able to shoot, leading me to the top, next to the button. im heading to the elevator doors now, its been taking a long time.

**Edit 8 (1,000 hours 8/2/21): after taking it in, i finally went into the elevator, i am currently still debating on starting the next chamber.

**Edit 7 (968 hours 7/15/21): I was stuck in the pit for around 130 hours until i realized that I have a portal gun, in which, i placed a portal, this brought me up to the next area, this place had me stumped, i was lost and confused for around 45 hours, then I realized that i had the portal gun yet again. Once i realized yet again that I had a portal gun, i was able to portal over to the end, I realized that I was moving through this game too fast, so i decided to wait here for a few more hours to take in the experience.

**Edit 6 (800 hours 6/1/21): To start, i am now in chamber 3, chamber 2 had me stumped for hours, to start, i didn't realize that i had to walk out of the elevator, to start the dialogue, i was awaiting Glados to aid me with information, telling me how exactly to start, it took about 13 hours until i decided to venture off on my own, once i did, the dialogue started. Honestly the rest of chamber 2 wasn't really hard, it took a few more hours, for me to realize that down the steps was where the portal opened, once i did, it didn't get any easier, as I didn't read how to shoot the portal, as it went away too quickly. This combined with me not knowing that i can only shoot on unobstructed white walls, i was in a pickle. For hours, I attempted to shoot through the hole that it starts out shooting at, this, was an issue, eventually, I built up the courage to attempt shooting the portal elsewhere, this brought me up to the next area, with a large wall with a door, I walked to the end, and went up the elevator. This is where I was stuck for a few hours, because i looked away from the door, when I actually looked back at the door it was opened, when i went through to the elevator i ended up in chamber 3, i actually fell into the pit and thats where i am stuck now.

**Edit 5 (720 hours 5/10/21): I am enthralled at how rich the story is from this game, i managed to defeat the difficult moving portal puzzle at record pace, thankfully this only took around 50 hours of gameplay, i was stumped for a while, gazing at the portals, and for a few hours i got stuck behind the portal, now i am past that and have went through the electric wall, this was scary, however, i didn't die, so i am able to ride up to the next chamber, i think I'm pretty far in this game so far.

**Edit 4 (669 hours 4/20/21): My friend just told me that you can actually walk through the electric wall, this was very misleading from glados, as she said that no items could pass through, judging by the fact that i am an item this makes no sense. Besides that, I am now in the elevator, is this near the end of the game?

**Edit 3 (669 hours 4/20/21): I have now made it past the room with the box, however, there is an electric wall, I have no clue what to do now as glados said something along the lines of "The Emancapation Grill will emancipate any items going through it" this likely includes me, i have no clue what to do now and i dont know if thats what she said, as she said this 40 hours of play time ago. Please help, I am now officially stuck and need some help, please.

**Edit 2 (at 615 hours, 4/9/21): I have placed the box on the button and am now puzzled, does anyone have any idea of how to proceed, thanks

**Edit (at 581 hours, 2/28/21): I have now started portal, I am now passed the first portal, I am really excited to finally beat this game**

**Initial comment (at 436 hours, 7/21/19): This game is amazing, so many hours of menu music, i think i'm going to start the game soon.
It's portal - of course it's amazing!

【코멘트 작성 날짜】:2019/07/22
【코멘트 작성 당시 플레이타임】:3시간
【코멘트】벨브사에서 만든 명작중 하나, 3D퍼즐게임 불후의 명작 포탈시리즈 입니다. 10년이 넘게 지난 지금도 명작이라는 명성때문에, 할인을 자주한다는 이유때문에  플레이하는 사람이 매우 많고 고평가가 계속 되고있습니다. 게임을 플레이하는 방법은 매우 간단합니다. 당신은 어느 실험실안에서 포탈을 만들어가면서 장애물을 뚫고 다음단계로 나아가는것입니다. 모든 단계를 클리어하면  케이크와 자유가 당신을 기다리고 있습니다. 초보자분들도 초반부분에 쉽게할 수 있다는 생각이 들정도로 난이도가 쉬웠습니다. 후반가면 꽤 어려워지지만 맵다고 할정도는 아닐정도의 난이도로 포탈을 잘 응용할줄만 알면 꽤나 빠르게 클리어할 수 있습니다. 3D멀미와 기괴한 분위기는 옛날 벨브 게임 전매특허! 퍼즐게임을 좋아하지 않는 사람도 '이게 그렇게나 잘만들었어?'라는 호기심에 사도 좋으실듯합니다. 2시간 안에 할만큼하고 아니다 싶으면 충분히 환불할 수 있을만큼의 짧은 분량. 퍼즐게임을 좋아하시는 분은  포탈2도 플레이하시는 것이 좋겠지요. 10500원의 가치가 없다고 느껴지셔도 걱정하지 않으셔도 됩니다. 벨브게임 약 20개가 들어난 꾸러미를 가끔 3000원 쯤에 판매할때가 있으니 그 때 사시면 엄청난 절약입니다
케이크 땡긴다
На прохождение этой игры уходит пол жизни.
我的智商開發之路由此開始

--------------------------------------------------------
В первую очередь, хочу сказать, чем игра зацепила:
1. Сюжет;
2. Физика;
3. Сложность [spoiler](для таких тормозов, как я)[/spoiler].
--------------------------------------------------------
На некоторых уровнях игра действительно заставляет задуматься. Лично я проходил её около 2 часов. 
9/10
--------------------------------------------------------
Стоит сказать и пару слов по сюжету: 
Главный герой попадает в какую-то экспериментальную лабораторию. Самим экспериментом руководит сумасшедший ИИ, придумавший стереотип о homo sapiens и их любви к вечеринкам с тортиками. По ходу прохождения протагонист натыкается на разные "секретные" комнаты, в которых, как оказывается, находились другие подопытные и оставляли там свои "наскальные рисунки" импульсивным почерком. В конце эксперимента, ИИ естессна решает избавиться от главного героя. Но, по закону жанра, в потолке можно создать портал и избежать казни. Далее, мы бежим по каким-то коридорам. [spoiler]Складывается впечатление, что протагонист попал на машиностроительную фабрику[/spoiler] 
В конце мы находим-таки антагониста и уничтожаем его. 
[spoiler]Вот только я не понял, что это ползло в конце по траве[/spoiler]. 
8/10
--------------------------------------------------------
О, физика в этой игре "моё уважение".
10/10
--------------------------------------------------------
9 тортиков из 10.

È un must per chi ama i videogiochi, soprattutto quelli rompicapo. La durata è limitata, circa 4 ore, e i livelli non sono difficilissimi. Non è presente una vera trama e anche i dialoghi sono pochissimi. Chi siamo noi? Cosa sono quelle macchine robot che ci parlano e ci attaccano a vista? Siamo forse un esperimento? Lo svolgimento del gioco é semplice: livello, ascensore, livello, ascensore,...e così via fino al boss finale (di una facilità disarmante). È comunque un titolo che va giocato, soprattutto per l'innovazione nell'usare i portali per risolvere i vari puzzle
I love this

My absolute favorite game of all time. The puzzles and physics system are great. The aesthetic fits the setting perfectly. The story is told in a fantastic and unique way (with great humor). A truly engaging and immersive experience.
Beyin isteyen bir iki bölümü var. Sırf mekaniklere alışık olmadığım için bir saatimi harcadığım birkaç bölüm var. Siz siz olun mekaniklere iyice alışın. Ayrıca kısa bir oyundu, sıra Portal 2'de.

Este juego es un gran clásico de los videojuegos, sería redundante decir las virtudes de un título tan conocido, pero aún así, si no has comprado y probado este grandioso juego, pruébalo, es una gran experiencia, puede ser un poco breve, pero tiene un gran sistema de físicas y una historia bastante congruente, además de tener una mecánica tan bien ejecutada como el uso de portales para resolver puzzles de una gran calidad, y que llegan a explorar las características y mecánicas de los portales, un clásico del PC Gaming y los videojuegos en general, además de eso no es muy caro.
Haha falling through aligned portals at high speed goes brrrrr
Рекомендую отличная игра больше не чего не скажу
Oyun keşke kısa olmasaydı ama oyun çok güzel

じっくり考えたい私には合わなかったようです。
ポータルを使用して色々な場所や物を移動するコンセプトはとても良かったのですが、タイミングの見極めや操作を急かされるシーンも多く、達成感よりも徒労感に苛まれ、後半になるにつれ、素直に楽しめない状況が増えていきました。
これ以上イライラを募らせるのは、「ゲームを楽しむ」本分にそぐわないと考え、テスト19の最序盤のシャッターをクリアできないまま、アンインストールすることとしました。
セールで安かったのが幸いでしょうか。続編も購入しましたが、プレイすることはないでしょう。
Как хочешь дело твоё
Шикарная игра.

我也来写下评测  V社游戏凸现了一个真实（不是非要这种方法通关）  很有意思
最有意思的地方是 我打完BOSS  听完通关音乐 然后主界面变出来了个蛋糕？！
然后看到了奖励地图？？？！  我去 又来4章   继续受苦？不可能的！  日后再玩！
   差点没吓死我！
